profileAlternative.name: Shuangxin Lan
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Facebook | M.S. in Statistics
profileAlternative.summary:
I enjoy working on various data problems to provide insight and support for future strategy of people.

Skills:
- Advanced programming experience in R, Python (e.g. numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, and pandas),
SAS (Certified Advanced Programmer), and SQL. Experienced with C, MATLAB, Unix, Stata
- Advanced in big data analysis: Hadoop (MapReduce, Hive, and Pig), Spark
- Experienced with visualization packages and software: ggplot2 (R), matplotlib (Python), and Tableau
- Experienced with numerical analysis, text mining, and image processing

I enjoy working on various data problems to provide insight and support for future strategy of people.

Skills:
- Advanced programming experience in R, Python (e.g. numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, and pandas),
SAS (Certified Advanced Programmer), and SQL. Experienced with C, MATLAB, Unix, Stata

given.text:
Ms. Lan was an immensely valuable member of the Ploughman Analytics team during her Summer 2016 internship. She has considerable expertise in Tableau, and was responsible for a major overhaul for one of our products, broadening its scope of coverage, enhancing its quality and function, and helping to produce a more appealing user experience.

Also, Ploughman benefitted from her expertise in classification methods, and her use of R and Python in putting that expertise into practice. She is knowledgeable, efficient, and formed very productive working relationships across the team. See less

items: Frequent Pattern Mining and Decision Tree
Exploration of NBA Teams’ Competitive Value of 2013 - 15 Regular Seasons
Forecasting the Rental Demand of a Bike-sharing System (Kaggle)
Research on Prevention and Control Strategies of HIV/AIDS (NSFC Project No.11471336)
Mathematical Contest in Modeling - College Coach Rankings
Peer Counseling Center at Renmin University of China
Student Union of School of Information at Renmin University of China
